string.text: Locate a set of gunsmith tools for Nitro so he can perform basic upgrades on your gear.
No, I don't really have anything I need done right now.
Too bad. I was hoping to trade some work for a few upgrades to my gear.

Ah, well I wouldn't be able to help you much there, either. I don't have the tools I would need to do even basic upgrades right now. I've been scrounging around for a set of gunsmith tools, but so far no luck. There's a place I haven't looked yet where I might be able to find some, but every time I go there it's occupied by mutants and zombies.
I'll take a look for you. Where is it?
Hey, that would be great. I'll mark the location on your map. If you are able to find a set of gunsmith tools there I'll be able to do basic upgrades for you and give you some cash to pay for them.
Ah, good, you found some gunsmith tools for me. Thanks stalker, let me know if you would like me to do any upgrades to your equipment.
Recover the set of technician's tools that was stolen from Nitro so he can perform advanced upgrades on your gear and equipment.

I was out scrounging around for some parts and I found a nice set of technician's tools. On the way back I ran into a Monolith patrol and was attacked. I managed to get away but they took all my gear, including the tool set I had found.
Where are the bastards? I'll get your tools back.
I'll mark their location on your map. If you can get my tools back from them I'll be able to do more advanced upgrades to your equipment.
You did it? Great! Now I'll be able to perform more advanced upgrades on your gear. Here, take this for your trouble.
Search the stash for a set of armorer's tools and bring them back to Nitro so he can perform expert upgrades to your gear.

Hawaiian told me he saw a stalker stashing away a set of tools. From what he described I think they may be armorer's tools. If I had a set of those I could do nearly any type of upgrade to your gear. If you want to check it out for me, I'll pay you for any tools you bring back.
Good! With these armorer's tools I'll be able to perform almost any upgrade. Thanks, stalker.
